Package org.eclipse.keyple.example.common.calypso

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalypsoBasicInfo
    Helper class to provide specific elements to handle Calypso cards.
    Demo_CalypsoBasicTransactionEngine
    This Calypso demonstration code consists in: Setting up a two-reader configuration and adding an observer method (update) Starting a card operation when a PO presence is notified (operatePoTransactions) Opening a logical channel with the SAM (C1 SAM is expected) see (SAM_C1_ATR_REGEX) Attempting to open a logical channel with the PO with 3 options: Selection with a fake AID (1) Selection with a Navigo AID Selection with a fake AID (2) Display SeResponse data If the Calypso selection succeeded, do a Calypso transaction ({doCalypsoReadWriteTransaction(PoTransaction, ApduResponse, boolean)} doCalypsoReadWriteTransaction}).
    Demo_HoplinkTransactionEngine
    This Calypso demonstration code consists in: Setting up a two-reader configuration and adding an observer method (update) Starting a card operation when a PO presence is notified (operatePoTransactions) Opening a logical channel with the SAM (C1 SAM is expected) see (SAM_C1_ATR_REGEX) Attempting to open a logical channel with the PO with 3 options: Selection with a fake AID Selection with a Navigo AID Selection with a Hoplink AID If the Hoplink selection succeeded, do an Hoplink transaction ({doHoplinkReadWriteTransaction(PoTransaction, ApduResponse, boolean)} doHoplinkReadWriteTransaction}).
    HoplinkInfo
    Helper class to provide specific information to handle Hoplink cards.
